statements: SELECT * FROM ProductionData WHERE production_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT product_name, production_quantity FROM ProductionData WHERE production_quantity > 100;
SELECT * FROM ProductionData WHERE product_name = 'Product A' AND production_quantity BETWEEN 50 AND 100;
SELECT MAX(production_quantity) AS max_production_quantity FROM ProductionData;
SELECT product_name, SUM(production_quantity) AS total_production FROM ProductionData GROUP BY product_name;
SELECT * FROM ProductionData ORDER BY production_date DESC, production_quantity ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT product_name, production_quantity FROM ProductionData WHERE waste_quantity > 0 ORDER BY production_date DESC
SELECT SUM(production_quantity) AS total_production FROM ProductionData WHERE production_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT product_name, production_date, production_quantity + waste_quantity AS total_output FROM ProductionData WHERE production_quantity > waste_quantity
SELECT product_name, AVG(production_quantity) AS avg_production FROM ProductionData GROUP BY product_name HAVING AVG(production_quantity) > 50
SELECT * FROM historical_production_data;
SELECT production_id, product_name, production_date FROM historical_production_data ORDER BY production_date DESC;
SELECT process_name, process_description FROM manufacturing_processes WHERE waste_reduction_rate > 0.5;
SELECT production_date, product_name, production_quantity, waste_quantity FROM historical_production_data WHERE production_quantity > 1000;
SELECT process_name, process_duration FROM manufacturing_processes ORDER BY process_duration ASC;
SELECT * FROM historical_production_data WHERE production_quantity > 100 ORDER BY production_date DESC
SELECT product_name, production_quantity FROM historical_production_data WHERE production_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT process_name, process_duration FROM manufacturing_processes WHERE waste_reduction_rate > 0.5 ORDER BY process_duration ASC
SELECT production_date, SUM(production_quantity) AS total_production FROM historical_production_data GROUP BY production_date HAVING total_production > 500
SELECT product_name, waste_quantity FROM historical_production_data WHERE production_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31' ORDER BY waste_quantity DESC
SELECT * FROM production_data;
SELECT product_id, production_date FROM production_data WHERE production_quantity > 100;
SELECT waste_id, waste_type, production_date FROM waste_data WHERE waste_quantity > 50;
SELECT process_name, process_description FROM manufacturing_processes;
SELECT production_quantity, waste_quantity FROM production_data INNER JOIN waste_data ON production_data.production_date = waste_data.production_date;
SELECT * FROM production_data WHERE production_quantity > 100 ORDER BY production_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT product_id, production_date, production_quantity FROM production_data WHERE production_quantity < 50 AND waste_quantity > 10
SELECT MAX(production_quantity) AS max_production_quantity FROM production_data
SELECT process_name, process_description FROM manufacturing_processes ORDER BY process_name ASC
SELECT waste_type, SUM(waste_quantity) AS total_waste_quantity FROM waste_data GROUP BY waste_type HAVING total_waste_quantity > 50
SELECT * FROM production_data;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM production_data ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT production_date, product_name, quantity FROM production_data WHERE production_date >= '2022-01-01' AND production_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM waste_data WHERE waste_weight > 100;
SELECT employee_name, job_title, hire_date FROM employee_data ORDER BY hire_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM production_data ORDER BY production_date DESC, quantity ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT production_id, product_name, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM production_data GROUP BY product_name HAVING total_quantity > 100 ORDER BY total_quantity DESC;

SELECT e.employee_id, e.employee_name, m.machine_name, m.maintenance_date FROM employee_data e INNER JOIN machine_data m ON e.employee_id = m.machine_id WHERE m.maintenance_cost > 1000 ORDER BY m.maintenance_date ASC;

SELECT p.production_id, p.production_date, w.waste_reason, w.waste_weight FROM production_data p LEFT JOIN waste_data w ON p.production_id = w.production_id WHERE w.waste_weight >= 10 ORDER BY p.production_date DESC;

SELECT e.employee_id, e.employee_name, e.job_title, e.hire_date, COUNT(p.production_id) AS total_production_records FROM employee_data e LEFT JOIN production_data p ON e.employee_id = p.production_id GROUP BY e.employee_id, e.employee_name, e.job_title, e.hire_date ORDER BY total_production_records DESC, e.hire_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM ProductionData WHERE production_quantity > 100;
SELECT product_name, production_date FROM ProductionData ORDER BY production_date DESC;
SELECT discarded_product_name, discard_reason FROM WasteData WHERE discard_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT process_name, optimization_details FROM ProcessOptimization WHERE optimization_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT site_name, location FROM ManufacturingSites WHERE site_name LIKE 'Prod%';
SELECT * FROM ProductionData WHERE production_quantity > 100 ORDER BY production_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, production_date FROM ProductionData WHERE product_name = 'Product A' LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM WasteData WHERE discard_reason LIKE '%damaged%' AND discard_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT site_name, location FROM ManufacturingSites WHERE location = 'USA' ORDER BY site_name ASC;
SELECT process_name, optimization_details FROM ProcessOptimization WHERE optimization_date >= '2022-01-01' AND optimization_date <= '2022-03-31';
